H0.text: Which composer of the opera The Bartered Bride died on this date in 1884. Verdi

H1.text: Which composer of the opera The Bartered Bride died on this date in 1884. Mozart

H2.text: Which composer of the opera The Bartered Bride died on this date in 1884. Rossini

H3.text: Which composer of the opera The Bartered Bride died on this date in 1884. Smetna

A5.text: Smetana composed the opera The Bartered Bride.
